name: Viking And His Meat
description:
Protect your precious meat from the birds.
If it hits the water you will starve.

Controls : A-D to go Left/Right.
Space to Jump.

This game was made in a very short time for the Unity & Game Development Workshop which will take place at the ATEI of Thessaloniki in 19/3/2016 ( i will actually be the instructor! ).

Since the workshop will only last 4-5 hours we needed something fairly
straightforward that can be recreated (at least for the most part) in such a short period of time.
I also wanted something funny/silly to hold the interest and not to bore people.

Music by Felix Arifin, you can find more of his awesome stuff here https://soundcloud.com/composerFA

Sprites were taken from http://opengameart.org
